CustomField.formula: IF ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Proposal/Price Quote'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Negotiation/Review'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Intends to Purchase'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed Lost'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName , 'Closed Cancelled') ) , 'Proposal Sent' , '' )
CustomField.label: Proposal Provided
